messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: state information
messages.msgSnippet: Oklahoma is an awesome state to unschool in.  As I am pretty busy right now, here is a link.  If you need anymore contact info, please feel free to e-mail me.
messages.messageBody:
Oklahoma is an awesome state to unschool in. As I am pretty busy right now, here is a link. If you need anymore contact info, please feel free to e-mail me.
http://www.unhinderedliving.com/legalschool.html

Chrissie


Joanne <billyandjoanne@...> wrote:
OOps...I just noticed you said, if our state was not on the list.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: state information
messages.msgSnippet: I am collecting state-level information from unschoolers in each state. We ll put the information up on the  website pretty soon. What I want
messages.messageBody:
I am collecting state-level information from unschoolers in each
state. We'll put the information up on the <unschooling.info> website
pretty soon.

What I want is a brief explanation of how you UNSCHOOL (not just
homeschool) within the legal requirements for homeschooling, plus any
unschooling-specific contact information for your state.

If your state is NOT listed below, I still need information on it -
so PLEASE help:

Arizona
California
Colorado
Connecticut
Delaware
Florida
Georgia
Illinois
Indiana
Iowa
Kansas
Maine
Maryland
Michigan
Missouri
Montana
New Mexico
New York
Ohio
Pennsylvania
South Carolina
South Dakota
Tennessee
Texas
Virginia


Thanks --

-pam sorooshian





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
